actions.name: Arid Adaptation
actions.description: Effect: The user is immune to the negative effects of Sunny Weather and Dusty Weather. The user takes 25% less damage from Fire-Type attacks while in either Weather. The user takes 25% more damage from Water-Type attacks while in Rainy Weather.
